price: Kuma waɗanda* suka warware alkawarin Allah daga bãyan ƙulla shi, kuma sunã yanke abin da Allah Ya yi umurui da shi dõmin a sãdar da shi kuma sunã ɓarna a cikin ƙasar. Waɗancan sunã da wata la'ana, kuma sunã da mũnin gida.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مِيثَٰقِهِۦ وَيَقۡطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ
footnotes: * Bayãnin siffõfin waɗanda suka ƙi karɓar kiran Allah. Watau akasin waɗanda aka yi bayaninsu a bãyã.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yanquḍūna ʿahda al-lahi min baʿdi mīthāqihi wayaqṭaʿūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi ulāika lahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
